code: import React from"react";import styles from"./Button.module.css";var Button=function Button(props){var buttonText=null;switch(props.type){case"next":buttonText="Next";break;case"prev":buttonText="Previous";break;case"submit":buttonText="Submit";break;default:break;}var buttonBody=React.createElement("span",{className:!props.validated&&props.type!=="prev"?styles.ButtonInactive:styles.Button,onClick:function onClick(){if(!props.validated&&props.type!=="prev"){return;}props.switchHandler(props.type,props.name,props.formValue);}},buttonText);return React.createElement(React.Fragment,null,buttonBody);};export default Button;
